text: Big Banana Feet is a 1976 comedy documentary movie of Billy Connolly directed by Murray Grigor and David Peat. == Story == They followed Billy on his 1975 Irish tour. == Other websites == * * * http://www.glasgowfilm.org/festival/whats_on/3487_big_banana_feet Category:1976 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:English- language movies
title: Big Banana Feet
